author: December
title: Liverpool's control, variety on display under Arne Slot - NBC Sports
text:
Watch Now
Liverpool's control, variety on display under Slot
Rebecca Lowe, Robbie Earle, and Robbie Mustoe share their takeaways from Liverpool's come-from-behind victory against Leicester City at Anfield to go seven points clear at the top of the table.
Up Next
[
](https://www.nbcsports.com)
Salah puts Liverpool 3-1 up over Leicester City
Salah puts Liverpool 3-1 up over Leicester City
Mohamed Salah calmly guides his effort into the far corner of the goal to give Liverpool a commanding 3-1 lead over the Foxes at Anfield.
[
](https://www.nbcsports.com)
Jones makes it 2-1 for Liverpool v. Leicester City
Jones makes it 2-1 for Liverpool v. Leicester City
Liverpool take the lead thanks to Curtis Jones' finish from close range to make it 2-1 against Leicester City at Anfield.
[
](https://www.nbcsports.com)
Gakpo’s belter brings Liverpool level v. Leicester
Gakpo's belter brings Liverpool level v. Leicester
Cody Gakpo cuts inside to his right foot and curls his effort into the top corner to grab Liverpool's equalizer right before halftime at Anfield.
[
](https://www.nbcsports.com)
Ayew blasts Leicester City ahead of Liverpool
Ayew blasts Leicester City ahead of Liverpool
Liverpool find themselves behind early in the first half as Jordan Ayew turns and drills his shot past Allison to give Leicester City a 1-0 lead at Anfield.

Catch up on all the action from Manchester United's Matchweek 18 showdown against Wolves at the Molineux.

Fernandes’ actions were ‘inexcusable’ loss
Fernandes' actions were 'inexcusable' loss
Rebecca Lowe, Robbie Earle, and Robbie Mustoe react to Manchester United's loss to Wolves and share their thoughts on Bruno Fernandes' red card.
[
](https://www.nbcsports.com)
Hwang seals Man United’s fate against Wolves
Hwang seals Man United's fate against Wolves
Matheus Cunha finds Hee-Chan Hwang for a simple finish from close range to give Wolves a 2-0 lead over Manchester United at the Molineux.
[
](https://www.nbcsports.com)
Cunha’s Olimpico gives Wolves lead over Man United
Cunha's Olimpico gives Wolves lead over Man United
Matheus Cunha whips in his corner kick and it curls into the back of the net to put Wolves 1-0 ahead of Manchester United at the Molineux.
[
](https://www.nbcsports.com)
Fernandes sent off for reckless tackle v. Wolves
Fernandes sent off for reckless tackle v. Wolves
Manchester United go down to 10 men against Wolves after Bruno Fernandes picks up his second yellow card for a reckless challenge at the beginning of the second half at the Molineux.
